greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction expansion of Fibonacci factorial constant.
reference: R. Graham, D. E. Knuth, O. Patashnik, Concrete Mathematics, Addison Wesley, 1990, pp. 478, 571.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
formula: C = (1-a)*(1-a^2)*(1-a^3)... 1.2267420... where a = -1/phi^2 and where phi is the Golden ratio = 1/2 + sqrt(5)/2.
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 5300); p=-1/(1/2 + sqrt(5)/2)^2; x=contfrac(prodinf(k=1, 1-p^k)); for (n=1, 5000, write("b062072.txt", n, " ", x[n])) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 31 2009
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Jun 27 2001
